data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Some creativity experts believe that singing or playing music helps people to come up with unique ideas. Do you agree or disagree with this statement? Support your opinion with examples from your personal experiences and observations.
data.answer: From my own perspective, I believe that singing can help people of different ages to come up with unique ideas and I would like to give some illustrations from my experiences. Firstly, singing music is a kind of creative activity. When the singer changes a few notes of the tune, a new song comes up. Secondly, singing songs can bring a peaceful atmosphere， which may also support people to have new ideas. Besides, about two years ago, I sang a popular song in my room after writing a complex dissertation. When I sang this song, I suddenly had a new research direction for my paper. Thus, I do think that singing or playing music is very useful for having new ideas.
